title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, long-armed cross, and overcasting stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Long narrow sampler dated 1645 near the top.  Motifs include the Sibmacher agn-- dei near the op.  Probably made following a 19th century pattern book.  Two lengths sewn together with decorative needle-made join.  Third short length of twill damask attached with attached braided fringe.
name: Sampler
